item.description: So Nele and I have been wanting to have you all over for some time now. So before the warm weather completely dissapears, lets meet at mine and Nele's place and grill up some brats - or steak, or feta, or veggie kebabs - whatever you would like. We will provide the grill and the space. We will also make some sort of salad, provide some bread, and buy a couple of 6 packs of beer. We will leave the rest up to you guys! Please let us know you will be bringing so that we can plan accordingly!
item.name: One Last Go At The Grill!!
